mapper.select: SELECT EMP_CODE, USAGE_CODE, DETAIL_CODE_NAME USAGE_NAME ,TO_CHAR(C.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE ,TO_CHAR(C.USE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') USE_DATE ,C.APPROVAL_STATUS, C.REJECT_CAUSE, C.ETC FROM CERTIFICATE C, DETAIL_CODE D WHERE C.USAGE_CODE=D.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER AND C.EMP_CODE=#{empCode} AND C.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME, C.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, C.USAGE_CODE, DD.DETAIL_CODE_NAME, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE, TO_CHAR(USE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USE_DATE, APPROVAL_STATUS, REJECT_CAUSE, ETC FROM CERTIFICATE C, EMPLOYEE_BASIC E,DEPARTMENT D, DETAIL_CODE DD WHERE C.EMP_CODE=E.EMP_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE(+) AND C.USAGE_CODE=DD.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER(+) AND REQUEST_DATE=TO_DATE(#{requestDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME, C.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, C.USAGE_CODE, DD.DETAIL_CODE_NAME, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE, TO_CHAR(USE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USE_DATE, APPROVAL_STATUS, REJECT_CAUSE, ETC FROM CERTIFICATE C, EMPLOYEE_BASIC E,DEPARTMENT D, DETAIL_CODE DD WHERE C.EMP_CODE=E.EMP_CODE(+) AND E.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE(+) AND C.USAGE_CODE=DD.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER(+) AND D.DEPT_NAME=#{deptName} AND REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
